reviews.review_msg: David Murphy is the best professor I have ever had. I took his class online during the pandemic and he was supportive, understanding, and very accommodating. He truly cares about his students and their well-being. He was always available for extra help on assignments and gave great feedback. Take his class!!

He knows what he's talking about and seems to work in the field of sound and has connections. I enjoyed his projects despite really only showing up to 3 classes the entire semester. As long as you do the projects well, you should get a good grade. Labs are more important than lectures.

Lectures were relaxed but very informative but there was a lot of material to cover in a short amount of time, especially for students without any prior film experience.  We didn't get any form kind of feedback and our grades were mostly just numbers without any final comments, so that part was hard.
Easy and interesting classes.  Tends to pick favorites.

A good approach to media education.
 Teaches the foundational skills and theory in a laid back approach. Fair makring and intresting content.
Chris is one of the best profs for CMNS classes!! He's easy-going, straightforward, and his lectures are easy to follow. Would definitely recommend taking his classes.

Chris is such a sweet guy but the format for 226 seemed messy. It was a bit chaotic and disorganized. The TA was a migraine and we didn't get to learn as much Adobe Premiere as past classes did. It was very much of watching tutorials and learning on your own. Chris is almost too nice to the point where this class felt too lax and he just sat back.

Chris is a nice guy, but the format of 226 is a bit weird. Attendance is mandatory because there's always a workshop portion of the class and that has participation marks attached to it. All the readings are done in class, which is fine, and there are online discussions every week. It's work intensive, especially for the final group video project.

Mr. Jeschelnik is the best professor I have ever met. Not only he will make sure that you do not fall behind with a genuine interest towards recognizing you and your effort. he will always, I repeat, always keep the lectures as hilarious as possible. The class allows the creativity to arise and with his help you can do wonders. Simply, the best!
